org.xchain.impl

Class ChainImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.impl.ChainImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Chain, Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCsvChain, AbstractTemplateCommand, ChainCommand, ChooseCommand, ChooseCommand.OtherwiseClause, ChooseCommand.WhenClause, CommandSourceCommand, DebugMessageCommand, IterateCommand, PipelineCommand, SerializerCommand, TemporaryCommand, TraceCommand, TransformerCommand, UrlSourceCommand, WithCommand

    public class ChainImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Chain
    Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.
    Author:
    Craig R. McClanahan, Christian Trimble
